name: Woken Anak Dye
description: Secret fires burning in the depths

name: Vin Rouge Dye
description: "A song full of light and brotherhood from a prison of glass..."

description: Makes you think of plush cushions and freshly-brewed coffee.

name: Sea Queen Dye
description: The hue of secrets as deep as the Sillaro.

name: Hibiscus Dye
description: A favourite of Omninesian youths.

name: Viola Dye
description: Everybody's grannie had a dress this colour.

name: Denizan Green Dye
description: What comes to mind when people think of Deniz.

name: Fresh Cucumber Dye
description: The cure for hot summer days.

name: Tihani Rose Dye
description: The sweetest of roses is not without thorns.

name: Stiletto Dye
description: Too cool for school.

name: Rose Bud Dye
description: Tender and adorable.

name: Brink Pink Dye
description: Seeing life through rose-coloured glasses.

name: Nanto Blue Dye
description: Sleepless nights under the neon signs.

name: Tucma Mines Dye
description: A glint of gemstones in the darkest pit.

name: Elm Dye
description: Slender branches dancing in the breeze.

name: Pocelain Dye
description: Subtle and soothing.

name: Bittersweet Dye
description: C'est la vie.

name: Kusini Earth Dye
description: The soul of the savanna, true and untamed.

name: Nutmeg Dye
description: Sweet, warm, spicy - like the life of a tamer.

name: Turquoise Dye
description: The preferred hue of the Riverine Fellowship.

name: Lochburg Blue Dye
description: The hue of dawn on yon bonnie banks and yon bonnie braes of Loch Aduar.

name: Ironstone Dye
description: Mimics the red hematite ore of the Quetzal mines.

name: Turquesa Dream Dye
description: A reverie of singing foam and salty breeze.

name: Forge Dye
description: The shade of freshly forged steel in the Smiths' Guild.

name: Old Lace Dye
description: Reminiscent of slightly yellow fine Arburian lace.

name: Only Sophia Dye
description: The Dojo Master has many admirers among fashion designers.

name: Pino's Memories Dye
description: The colour of experience.

name: Orange Pansunset Dye
description: Those childhood summers that would never end.

name: Mudshire Green Dye
description: Rainy days splashing in the puddles.

name: Kakama Green Dye
description: A mysterious green, like the secret waters of a long-lost cenote.

name: Hatless Hill Dust Dye
description: It clings to the fabric as it clings to the soul.

name: Disco Dye
description: Gimme that night fever.
